definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: The temperature has not got cesse to rise up.
This season, frequent rainfall, the temperature gradually lower end of the 10 snowbound mountainous.
sentences.chinese: 此季節降雨頻繁，氣溫漸低，10月末將大雪封山。

sentences.english: As the temperature is below zero, the water pipe ruptured with the cold.
sentences.chinese: 氣溫已降到零度以下，水管凍裂了。

sentences.english: The drop in temperature frosted the tomato plants.
sentences.chinese: 氣溫下降凍壞了番茄苗。

sentences.english: Global average temperature records are vital to understanding how the climate is changing.
sentences.chinese: 全球平均氣溫紀錄對認識氣候變化的過程至關重要。

sentences.english: If the temperature is below 0℃ please use Varlon Brand anti-freeze glass cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 如氣溫低於此溫度，可使用慧霖牌防凍型玻璃水。

sentences.english: A short distance from Moscow, the temperature had already dropped to minus 4 degrees Celsius. On November 3, the winter's first snow came.
sentences.chinese: 剛出莫斯科城，氣溫就降到攝氏零下4度。

sentences.english: Temperatures over 44 degrees C (110 degrees F) made clambering down the steep slopes arduous.
sentences.chinese: 由於氣溫超過44℃，因此由陡坡攀爬下山非常費力。

sentences.english: The temperature will stay above zero in the day-time , but at night it will fall below zero again.
sentences.chinese: 白天氣溫在零度以上，夜間又將降到零度以下。

sentences.english: It is reported that the temperature will decline sharply in one or two days.
sentences.chinese: 據報告近日氣溫將明顯下降。

sentences.english: In summer days when the trees grow fast, temperature is relatively low and heat unadequate.
sentences.chinese: 而夏日林木生長旺季則氣溫較低，熱量欠缺。

sentences.english: The effect of city on meteorological elements (for example , temperature)are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 文章探討了城市對氣溫等氣象要素的影響規律。

sentences.english: Between the months of April to October, inland temperatures drop to as low as -60C.
sentences.chinese: 每年四月至次年十月，內陸最低氣溫可至零下60度。

sentences.english: Example: A biting, cold wind below in last Sunday, and temperatures dropped sharply in PuYang.
sentences.chinese: 濮陽上週日開始颳起刺骨的寒風，氣溫也急劇下降。

sentences.english: The temperature-changing character of northeast is "warm winter and cool summer".
sentences.chinese: 東北地區的氣溫變化特點，可謂是“冬暖夏涼”。
預計氣溫將在零度以下。

definition: to become cooler/to lower the temperature/cooling/(of interest, activity etc) to decline
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
